Date,Name,Type,Details
1 Jan,Sunday,New Year's Day,National holiday,
20 Mar,Monday,March Equinox,Season,
26 Mar,Sunday,Daylight Saving Time starts,Clock change/Daylight Saving Time,
14 Apr,Friday,Good Friday,Local holiday,Bas-Rhin, Haut-Rhin, Moselle
16 Apr,Sunday,Easter Sunday,Observance,
17 Apr,Monday,Easter Monday,National holiday,
1 May,Monday,Labor Day / May Day,National holiday,
8 May,Monday,WWII Victory Day,National holiday,
25 May,Thursday,Ascension Day,National holiday,
28 May,Sunday,Mother's Day,Observance,
4 Jun,Sunday,Whit Sunday,Observance,
5 Jun,Monday,Whit Monday,National holiday,
18 Jun,Sunday,Father's Day,Observance,
21 Jun,Wednesday,June Solstice,Season,
14 Jul,Friday,Bastille Day,National holiday,
15 Aug,Tuesday,Assumption of Mary,National holiday,
22 Sep,Friday,September Equinox,Season,
29 Oct,Sunday,Daylight Saving Time ends,Clock change/Daylight Saving Time,
1 Nov,Wednesday,All Saints' Day,National holiday,
11 Nov,Saturday,Armistice Day,National holiday,
21 Dec,Thursday,December Solstice,Season,
24 Dec,Sunday,Christmas Eve,Observance,
25 Dec,Monday,Christmas Day,National holiday,
26 Dec,Tuesday,St Stephen's Day,Local holiday,Bas-Rhin, Haut-Rhin, Moselle
